articles.title: The Pembrokeshire Murders viewers taken aback by Gavin and Stacey star appearance: 'Owain' - Express
articles.description: THE PEMBROKESHIRE MURDERS premiered on ITV on Monday as the haunting story of killer John Cooper was dramatised on-screen. However, away from the gripping drama, some fans were distracted by a return to screen for a star of Gavin and Stacey.
